title: Child-and-Parents Relationship Change History Get
description: How to get the change history for a child-and-parents relationship.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<atom:feed xmlns:gx="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <atom:id>uuid:4863aa4e-cee9-486d-ae49-54f80bd77387</atom:id>
    <atom:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PC12-345" rel="child-and-parents" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship"/>
    <atom:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PC12-345/changes" rel="self" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Change History"/>
    <atom:title>Change History for Parent Relationship Pair PC12-345</atom:title>
    <atom:updated>2013-06-18T16:02:47.608-06:00</atom:updated>
    <atom:entry>
        <fs:changeInfo objectType="http://familysearch.org/v1/CoupleChildRelationship" operation="http://familysearch.org/v1/Create" reason="because it was necessary"/>
        <atom:contributor>
            <atom:name>Mr. Contributor</atom:name>
        </atom:contributor>
        <atom:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/users/agents/UKMGTY" rel="agent"/>
        <atom:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/changes/207243/restore" rel="restore" title="Restore Change"/>
        <atom:title>Child and Parents Relationship Created</atom:title>
        <atom:updated>2013-06-18T16:02:47.618-06:00</atom:updated>
    </atom:entry>
    <atom:entry>
        <fs:changeInfo objectModifier="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship" objectType="http://gedcomx.org/Fact" operation="http://familysearch.org/v1/Create" reason="because it was necessary"/>
        <atom:contributor>
            <atom:name>Mr. Contributor</atom:name>
        </atom:contributor>
        <atom:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/users/agents/UKMGTY" rel="agent"/>
        <atom:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/changes/146372/restore" rel="restore" title="Restore Change"/>
        <atom:title>Lineage Added</atom:title>
        <atom:updated>2013-06-18T16:02:47.619-06:00</atom:updated>
    </atom:entry>
    <atom:entry>
        <fs:changeInfo objectType="http://familysearch.org/v1/CoupleChildRelationship" operation="http://familysearch.org/v1/Delete" reason="because it was necessary"/>
        <atom:contributor>
            <atom:name>Mr. Contributor</atom:name>
        </atom:contributor>
        <atom:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/users/agents/UKMGTY" rel="agent"/>
        <atom:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/changes/143125/restore" rel="restore" title="Restore Change"/>
        <atom:title>Child and Parents Relationship Removed</atom:title>
        <atom:updated>2013-06-18T16:02:47.623-06:00</atom:updated>
    </atom:entry>
</atom:feed>
